RelatedSentence: Russia expects the Organization for Security and Cooperation in Europe ( OSCE ) to perform resolute actions to release Russian LifeNews reporters detained in Ukraine , the Russian Foreign Ministry said Monday .

Russia expects the Organization for Security and Cooperation in Europe ( OSCE ) to perform resolute actions to release Russian LifeNews reporters detained in Ukraine , the Russian Foreign Ministry said Monday .

On our insistence , the OSCE Swiss presidency gave an instruction to the leadership of the organization 's special monitoring mission in Ukraine to push for the journalists ' release , the ministry said .
